entities.name: house-elf liberation front
entities.description: The House-Elf Liberation Front is mentioned in the text as a group or organization. It is not explicitly described but its name suggests that it is related to the liberation of house-elves.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who was absent from dinner and the library, but later arrives at Gryffindor Tower in a hurry. She seems to be excited about something.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as someone who was alone in the library when Ron and Harry went to look for Hermione. He is described as a person that girls are interested in getting an autograph from.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as someone who was with Harry looking for Hermione in the library and later at Gryffindor Tower. He seems to be hesitant about asking Viktor Krum for an autograph.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as someone who was with Ron looking for Hermione in the library and later at Gryffindor Tower. He seems to be involved in a conversation with Ron about whether or not to ask Viktor Krum for an autograph.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is mentioned as the location where Ron and Harry went back after looking for Hermione in the library. It is also the location where Hermione arrives later.

relationships.description: Hermione contacts Harry by grabbing his arm and trying to drag him back along.
Ron considers asking Viktor Krum for an autograph, but loses enthusiasm when he sees other girls doing the same.
